articles.author: Cody Corrall
articles.title: OpenAI 2024 event: How to watch new ChatGPT product reveals and demos - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI is in the holiday spirit, it seems. The ChatGPT series of reveals, called “12 Days of OpenAI,” will be livestreamed at 10 a.m. PT each weekday
articles.content: OpenAI is in the holiday spirit, it seems. The ChatGPT series of reveals, called 12 Days of OpenAI, will be livestreamed at 10 a.m. PT each weekday through December 23. So far, we’ve seen the launch … [+698 chars]
